title: Instruction & Meditation: Tonglen - Radical Compassion (retreat talk)
itunes:title: Instruction & Meditation: Tonglen - Radical Compassion (retreat talk)
description: Instruction & Meditation: Tonglen - Radical Compassion (retreat talk) - We are conditioned to avoid suffering - our own and others. By pulling away, we also contract our heart and disconnect from our innate capacity for compassion. This short talk and meditation is a training in touching vulnerability, and discovering the boundless heartspace that can be a transformer of sorrows. (from the Spring 2017 IMCW Spring 7-day Silent Retreat - previously unpublished)
